General.Name: First Watch Restaurant Group Inc
General.Description: First Watch Restaurant Group, Inc. operates and franchises restaurants under the First Watch trade name in the United States. The company was formerly known as AI Fresh Super Holdco, Inc. and changed its name to First Watch Restaurant Group, Inc. in December 2019. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bradenton, Florida.
General.Address: 8725 Pendery Place, Bradenton, FL, United States, 34201
